info.title: Abstract Email Validator
info.description: Improve your delivery rate and clean your email lists with Abstract's industry-leading email validation.

email.description: The value for “email” that was entered into the request.
email.title: Email

autocorrect.description: If a typo has been detected then this parameter returns a suggestion of the correct email (e.g., johnsmith@gmial.com => johnsmith@gmail.com). If no typo is detected then this is empty.
autocorrect.title: Autocorrect

deliverability.description: Abstract’s evaluation of the deliverability of the email (DELIVERABLE, UNDELIVERABLE, and UNKNOWN).
deliverability.title: Deliverability

quality_score.title: Quality score
quality_score.description: An internal decimal score between 0.01 and 0.99 reflecting Abstract’s confidence in the quality and deliverability of the submitted email.

is_valid_format.title: Is valid format
is_valid_format.description: Is true if the email follows the format of “address @ domain . TLD”. If any of those elements are missing or if they contain extra or incorrect special characters, then it returns false.

is_free_email.title: Is free email
is_free_email.description: Is true if the email’s domain is found among Abstract’s list of free email providers Gmail, Yahoo, etc).

is_disposable_email.title: Is disposable email
is_disposable_email.description: Is true if the email’s domain is found among Abstract’s list of disposable email providers (e.g., Mailinator, Yopmail, etc).

is_role_email.title: Is role email
is_role_email.description: Is true if the email’s local part (e.g., the “to” part) appears to be for a role rather than individual. Examples of this include “team@”, “sales@”, info@”, etc.

is_catchall_email.title: Is catchall email
is_catchall_email.description: Is true if the domain is configured to catch all email.

is_mx_found.title: Is MX found
is_mx_found.description: Is true if MX Records for the domain can be found. Only available on paid plans. Will return null and UNKNOWN on free plans.

is_smtp_valid.title: Is SMTP valid
is_smtp_valid.description: Is true if the SMTP check of the email was successful. If the check fails, but other checks are valid, we’ll return the email as UNKNOWN.

get.description: Perform checks (e.g., free email, disposable domain, etc) on an email address.
